parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.55

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the visibility of the given waypoint in 3D HUD view (for map visibility see [[showWaypoint]]).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> waypoint '''setWaypointVisible''' visible

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> waypoint: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]]

</value></part><part><name>p2 </name>=<value> visible: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[grp, 2] [[setWaypointVisible]] [[false]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code><ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[[group]] [[player]], [[currentWaypoint]] ([[group]] [[player]])] [[setWaypointVisible]] [[false]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[waypointVisible]], [[showWaypoint]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]


<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on September 23, 2015 - 08:22 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Sixtyfour|Sixtyfour]]</dt>
<dd class="note">This does not apply to Zeus/Curator view... so this command won't hide the Waypoint lines and icons from your view as a Zeus when units are in your EditableAddons list.
</dd>
</dl>
